channel.title: OCR on Code Fry Dev
channel.description: Recent content in OCR on Code Fry Dev

item.title: Google Lense For OCR
item.description: Library to use Google Lens OCR for free, via API used in Chromium. This doesn't require running a headless browser. It's set up to work without any options, there's no need to be authorized (no need for Google account!).

item.title: Tesseract For OCR
item.description: Tesseract OCR is one of the most popular open-source OCR libraries for text Extraction from image. It supports a wide range of languages and can recognize text from various image formats.

item.title: Window Media OCR library For OCR
item.description: Windows Media OCR, extracted from Microsoft's PowerToys repository, provides a powerful solution for text recognition by leveraging the capabilities of the Windows operating system. In this blog, we'll guide you through setting up and using Windows Media OCR in your projects.
